Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

In compliance with the orders given by Your Excellency, Your Excellency João Lourenço Vidal, bearer of this, carrying in his company the few soldiers who wished to march, and that Your Excellency

This municipality is composed of people as bad and inconsistent as none other in the province, proving to Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency  
Military Command Headquarters of the municipality of Santo Antônio,  
Santo Antônio, February 9, 1844.  

Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Marshal of the Field Tomás José da Silva, Distinguished Commander of the Garrison of Porto Alegre.  
Antônio de Melo e Albuquerque  
Colonel Military Commander of the municipality of Santo Antônio.
